info.name: Firefox Push Notification - Orange and Black
info.description:
Innnnconceivable presents a customization for Firefox push notification popups that is orange text with black background.  Title centered and image shrinkd to reduce size of that annoying, huge white box.  

3 second countdown till window closes.
info.additionalInfo:
This was tested with Pushbullet on Firefox 50.0.2 with Windows 7 Pro.

                                      ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ 

<b>**I made you chuckle and you like this style, help me and my family out by donating.**<b>
